report.title: In A Nutshell
report.author: Anti Effexor
report.bodytext: After a hard night of drinking at the local bar, my friend decided to sell me, rather GIVE me some free Effexor. Little did I know what those 2 little pills held for me. /n /n A day of nausea, sickness, dizziness, headaches, stomach aches, and all around shittiness followed. /n /n If you're reading this wanting to take Effexor, listen to me. Don't do it.
